text:
If fo:marker consists of PCDATA + fo:inline, when processing an
fo:retrieve-marker the PCDATA is missing.
creator: guillaume.levrero@free.fr

text:
Created attachment 20377
FO to reproduce problem
creator: guillaume.levrero@free.fr

text:
Confirmed... I managed to reproduce it (in spite of the missing FO; you attached the PDF twice ;-)

Still looking for a fix, but as a possible workaround, I noticed the problem only occurs if the PCDATA node 
starts with a linefeed. Try to avoid:

<fo:marker>
  Text

and use:

<fo:marker>Text
creator: adelmelle@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 20392
FO to reproduce problem
creator: guillaume.levrero@free.fr
